001package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping;
002
003import squidpony.squidgrid.gui.SColor;
004import squidpony.annotation.Beta;
005
006/**
007 * A base class for cell level features common to roguelike dungeons.
008 *
009 *
010 * @author Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com
011 */
012@Beta
013public class Terrain {
014
015    public static final Terrain FLOOR = new Terrain('.', SColor.SLATE_GRAY),
016            WALL = new Terrain('#', SColor.CREAM),
017            CLOSED_DOOR = new Terrain('+', SColor.BROWNER),
018            OPEN_DOOR = new Terrain('/', SColor.BROWNER),
019            EMPTY_SPACE = new Terrain('_', SColor.AMETHYST),
020            LIQUID = new Terrain('~', SColor.AZUL),
021            ENTRANCE = new Terrain('<', SColor.FADED_SEN_NO_RIKYUS_TEA),
022            EXIT = new Terrain('>', SColor.GRAPE_MOUSE);
023    private final char symbol;
024    private final SColor color;
025
026    private Terrain(char symbol, SColor color) {
027        this.symbol = symbol;
028        this.color = color;
029    }
030
031    /**
032     * Returns the character representation for this terrain. This is meant to
033     * be for display purposes and should not be used to check for equality
034     * since multiple different terrains may return the same symbol.
035     *
036     * @return
037     */
038    public char symbol() {
039        return symbol;
040    }
041
042    /**
043     * Returns the color for this terrain.
044     *
045     * @return
046     */
047    public SColor color() {
048        return color;
049    }
050
051    @Override
052    public int hashCode() {
053        int hash = 7;
054        hash = 83 * hash + this.symbol;
055        return hash;
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public boolean equals(Object obj) {
060        if (obj == null) {
061            return false;
062        }
063        if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
064            return false;
065        }
066        final Terrain other = (Terrain) obj;
067        return this.symbol == other.symbol;
068    }
069}
